name: Combined Ranking and Regression
title: Combined Ranking and Regression
author: Donald Sculley
publisher: Proceedings of the 16th ACM SIGKDD international conference on Knowledge discovery and data mining

parameter.name: loss_function_identifier
parameter.description: Decide if you want to use a 'squared' or 'logistic' loss function.

parameter.name: lambda
parameter.description: The regularization factor used when the gradient is computed.

parameter.name: iterations
parameter.description: The number of iterations the algorithm is used.
